channel.title: How to make object give stats? Hybrid PVP 525
channel.description: Hello, how do I make an object give me skills. For example, if I click on a prayer altar, and It gives me 99's in every stat. How would I code that? Details please. :) Thanks. Owner owwch ;D

item.title: How to make object give stats? Hybrid PVP 525
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Thanks Do I put it under clickobject.java or actionhandler.java do you know?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make object give stats? Hybrid PVP 525

item.title: How to make object give stats? Hybrid PVP 525
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

case ####://change this to your object id. for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You have been given all 99s"); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: How to make object give stats? Hybrid PVP 525
